attributes.action: Give no taxpayers money at all to any bank
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is never enough money to help the poor escape from the poverty traps created and sustained by the rich. Never enough money to stop selling arms that kill civillians worldwide. Never enough money for for pensions, the elderly and disadvantaged. But there is always plenty to stop rich people losing a fraction of their priveleged lifestyles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
